Comment 2: 
Note also that getting the slice from an entire array (not a slice) is done better via:
&a.

Thus, the shortcut a[:n] is only useful syntactic sugar for a[0:n] where n < len(a).
It 
seems that not having to write the 0 is not going to make the code considerably better 
or easier to read, in particular since the ':' is hard to see in the first place.
